body.name: 60 Sheets Vintage Floral Stationary with 30 Envelopes, Letter Writing Paper for Poems, Thank You Notes, Pen Pal, Scrapbook, Calligraphy (6 Designs, 10.2 x 7.25 In)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 17 mins
features: Stationery Paper and Envelopes Set: In a world where electronic communication dominates, this stationary set allows you to connect with others in a more personal and meaningful way
6 Timeless Designs: Our set comes with 6 vintage floral designs making this the ideal pen pal stationery set or use the pretty stationary for wedding invitations and thank you notes
Printer-Friendly: The floral personalized stationery sets for writing letters with envelopes are made of premium quality paper that is compatible with both inkjet and laser printers
Dimensions: Measuring 10.2 x 7.25 inches, this cute stationary set is the great for writing letters, ensuring that you have ample space to express your thoughts and feelings with ease
Comes With: Includes 60 sheets of letter writing paper in 6 designs and 30 corresponding envelopes to ensure all of your handwritten letters will look and feel luxurious
body.description: 60 Sheets Vintage Floral Lined Stationery Paper with 30 Envelopes VINTAGE STATIONERY: Add a festive touch to your party invitations, cards, thank you notes, and save the dates this stationary set is features a vintage floral sheets and lined envelopes PRINTER-FRIENDLY: Compatible with inkjet and laser printers: simply create your design, and print EASILY CUSTOMIZE: Each sheet of paper has a sizable space to add personalized text, lines for signatures, adhesive stickers, and personalized messages; perfect for weddings, anniversaries, birthdays, graduations or just writing letters DIMENSIONS: Each sheet measures 10.25 x 7.25 inches; envelopes: 8.45 x 4.3 inches WHATâS INCLUDED: Includes 60 sheets of writing paper in 6 designs and corresponding envelopes ASIN: B083TRM8NW This stationery set features 6 distinct vintage inspired floral designs is perfect for giving your message a special touch. This set of 30 envelopes and 60 writing pages is ideal for party invitations, thank you notes or save the dates. The elegant and yet versatile design allows for dual-use in both portrait and landscape orientations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful stationary, makes me happy to write on it.
reviews.reviewText: This stationary has pretty designs with colorful envelopes that has a matching design on the interior. I like the thickness of the paper, it is durable and will hold up with writing and through the mail. I like the variety, five different floral designs with a victorian feel. I will definitely order this stationary again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very beautiful set of stationary. Bought it as a gift for my secret sister.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, Beautiful Stationary
reviews.reviewText: I really like this stationary! The envelope lining match the paper and they make for a beautiful presentation. The paper is thick enough to handle the papermate markers I use for letter writing and the envelope lining also acts as a security lining. Overall a quality product that I am very pleased with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty but needs a box
reviews.reviewText: I would have given it 5 stars if it had come in a box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This product was exactly as described and I am very pleased with the quality. I write to many people and they have remarked on the pretty designs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used for Elopement Vows
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I wrote our vows on this stationary for our elopement. I was looking for something with a classic retro vibe and these were perfect! I’ll be using the rest for thank you letters for our wedding gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my daughter to send letters. She loves them and it's so fun to receive. It just adds that extra special touch to your correspondence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Would recommend! Great for doing our letter writing
Pour offrir en cadeau pour ma petite fille qui correspond avec des amis

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely set to write on but the writing paper and envelopes don’t match. Disappointed

I have ordered this time and time again. I write a lot of letters and I really love this paper very much. I was very excited to see it available again after not being able to get it for a while. I usually order multiples and stock up on it. I do not understand why the price has more than doubled. I’m used to paying $16 for this product and will not buy it at this unreasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 27, 2023
